scripts.lint: npm run lint:ts-standard && npm run lint:depcheck
scripts.test: npm run lint; npm run build; mocha 'test/**/*.js'
scripts.install: sudo rm -f /usr/local/bin/lehramt-informatik.js; sudo chmod a+x dist/main.js; sudo ln -s $(pwd)/dist/main.js /usr/local/bin/lehramt-informatik.js; sudo rm -f /usr/local/bin/i; sudo ln -s $(pwd)/dist/main.js /usr/local/bin/i
